main.name: Brian Quach
main.description: I enjoy building products that provide value to others.
main.bio: Hey I'm Brian! I am a backend engineer focused on distributed, scalable systems. I studied Computer Science at the University of Toronto.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Created OAuth 2.0 Authentication and Account management.

testimonials.text: Working with Brian was a delight since he was able to pick up new technologies and tools extremely quickly. Brian's communication skills made it effortless to work with him. In particular, Brian is quick to understand things communicated to him and he is able to engage with others extremely well too. Brian was able to deliver quality results while working with a variety of different languages and tools across several different projects. Brian consistently completed his assigned projects ahead of schedule and was always looking for additional work that he could take on to increase his impact. I would strongly recommend Brian.
testimonials.user: Dylan Kristolaitis, Software Engineer at Google

testimonials.text: Within 2 weeks, Brian went from not knowing how the OAuth 2.0 Authentication System works to teaching our team how to build it into our website. He is driven and curious. He would be an asset to any team.
testimonials.user: Samin Khan, CTO of Animo AI

testimonials.text: Brian is an extremely hardworking person. He radiates an aura that motivates you and actively encourages his peers to strive for the best. Personally, Brian motivated me to apply to Amazon and he even conducted mock interviews, preparing me both technically and behaviourally. I eventually succeeded, no doubt in part to his help and motivation.
testimonials.user: Jimmy Tan, Software Engineer at Amazon

testimonials.text: Brian is an exceptional teammate whose attention to detail and problem solving make him a valued member on any team. Whenever I have worked with him, he's ensured that we always put out our best work. Brian was also a great help in the interview process, where his prior experiences interviewing at top companies provided me the skills and confidence I needed to land a position at Amazon.
testimonials.user: Saim Ibrahim, Software Engineer at Amazon

testimonials.text: Brian has been both a confidant and a mentor to me all throughout my university life. The advice he gave me directly lead to my post-secondary success.
testimonials.user: Arjun Pandher, Student at University of Toronto
